text: The lowly will say to the arrogant, “No! It was your plotting by day and night—when you ordered us to disbelieve in God and to set up equals with Him.” They will ˹all˺ hide ˹their˺ remorse when they see the torment. And We will put shackles around the necks of the disbelievers. Will they be rewarded except for what they used to do
